title: Sheets
description: Build a Google Sheets driven version of CollectionBuilder. Publish your Sheet (or any CSV) and add the link to the repository to generate a CollectionBuilder site.
points: Focus on the spreadsheet with live updates as metadata changes; Great for records-only sites; Minimal repository work; Same great CollectionBuilder framework.

title: GitHub Pages
description: A Lightweight framework to get you started. Build a digital collection totally online using GitHub and GitHub Pages for all configurations and object storage.
points: Classroom Projects;Serverless Omeka;Small Collections;Learning about Git, Static Web Technologies, web development and design

title: CSV
description:
A robust, metadata-driven collection.
Build a sustainable Stand Alone project on a highly customizable base using the newest version of CollectionBuilder.
points: Flexible object locations and representations;Designed for easier customization and creating new visualizations;Fully self-contained projects;Focus on metadata and curate items from anywhere
